name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary: Senior Network Engineer with a robust background in developing and maintaining high-performance network solutions, equipped with 13+ years of experience in the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in implementing **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and **Terraform** for automated deployments, and well-versed in CI/CD methodologies. Hands-on expertise in network security and management via **Cisco**, **Juniper**, **PaloAlto**, and **CheckPoint** technologies. Skilled in Python programming for developing **REST-APIs**, and proficient in orchestration and automation using **Ansible**. Solid foundation in ITIL practices and DevOps strategies, ensuring compliance with industry standards. Capable of utilizing **JSON** and **YAML** for configuration management and proficient in network protocols such as **routing** and **VLAN**. Adept at leveraging real-time analytics and predictive modeling in developing IT solutions. Strong advocate for aligning technical solutions with compliance-driven frameworks.
